sense.gloss: to be packed (with), to be full (space, schedule, etc.)
to be blocked (road, pipe, nose, etc.), to be clogged, to be plugged up
to shorten (width, interval, etc.), to shrink (shirt, word form, etc.), to narrow
to be at a loss, to be hard pressed
x: 気の詰まる・きのつまる

sense.gloss: to end up, to be settled
x: 詰まる所・つまるところ

sense.gloss: to hit the ball near the handle of the bat

sdata.j: ↑愚者↑↓ぐしゃ↓はすぐ↑奥↑↓おく↓の↑手↑↓て↓を↑出↑↓だ↓し↑行↑↓い↓き|↑詰↑↓づ↓まる|。
sdata.e: A fool's bolt is soon shot.

sdata.j: ↑放↑↓はな↓してくれ、↑息↑↓いき↓が|↑詰↑↓つ↓まる|。
sdata.e: Let me go. You're choking me.

sdata.j: そんなに↑急↑↓いそ↓いで↑食↑↓た↓べると↑喉↑↓のど↓に|↑詰↑↓つ↓まる|よ。
sdata.e: If you eat so hurriedly your throat will get blocked.

sdata.j: そんなに↑急↑↓いそ↓いで↑食↑↓た↓べると↑喉↑↓のど↓に|↑詰↑↓つ↓まる|よ。
sdata.e: You'll choke if you wolf your food down like that.
